column2: "What? My manner here is very different from when I'm on a mission?"
"Pfft, course it's different. Otherwise, my cover would get blown. I'm not supposed to give any hints, you know!"
"When people act in different roles, they put on different personalities."
"The me that acts like an idol."
"For each one its necessary to perform differently."
"So which one is the real me?"
"That's not a question I can answer."
"Which one is the real me... is something I've already forgotten."
